\f0\fs24 \cf0 # Apply OSRM to Norway\
\
This project uses the `orsm` package in R and computes distances and times between Norway cities.\
\
## Installation\
\
> Install `osrm` [website]({\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "https://project-osrm.org/"}}{\fldrslt https://project-osrm.org}})\
\
## How to compute distances?\
\
The package only needs origins and destinations in `sf` format. \
\
## Output\
\
The output is either in matrix format, but also in shapefile.\
\
This ShinyApp [here]({\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "https://dz683z-mateo.shinyapps.io/osrm_norway/"}}{\fldrslt https://dz683z-mateo.shinyapps.io/osrm_norway/}}) shows the result!}
